entry.title: Monark LC4 G3 Display Electronically Controlled Ergometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 14999.00

When accuracy, versatility and usability matter.
The LC4 G3 Display Electronically Controlled Ergometer  is an advanced training and test bike with either constant or cadence dependent power output. Equipped with Monark’s pendulum system which enables accurate calibration of the ergometer. The resistance control system can be controlled as a stand-alone system or can be controlled from a computer with the Monark Test Software. The perfect fit frame and the 20 kg flywheel create an optimal cycling sensation.

TECHNICAL DETAILS:

Certifications: EU directive 93/42/EU class IIa

Handlebar: Racing handlebar

Stem: Adjustable, horizontal 60 mm, vertical 500-910 mm

Seatpost: Adjustable, horizontal 60 mm, vertical 530-940 mm

Saddle: Moody

Bottom Bracket (BB): 68/110 mm

Crank: Steel, 172.5 mm

pedals: 9/16″, combi SPD

Resistance:

System: Pendulum

Flywheel: 20 kg, 44 lb

Display: RPM, Time, Speed, Distance, Watt, HR (ANT+, 5k Hz)

Connectivity: USB

Weight & measurements:

Max. user weight: 180 kg, 396 lb

Length: 1405 mm

Width: 640 mm

Height: max. 1240 mm

Weight: 77 kg, 196 lb

Power requirement: 220 V (12 V, 2.5 A)

entry.title: Monark 891E VO2 Max / SubMax Testing Upper Body Ergometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: HealthCare International
Type:
Price: 7299.00

Arm ergometer for testing and training.

Arm ergometer with weight basket for measuring the anaerobic and aerobic capacity of the upper body. The calibrated weights guarantee unsurpassed accuracy, repeatability and reliability. The ergometer is placed on a stable stand that can be adjusted in height to provide an optimal position, both sitting and standing.

 

Monark  891E VO2 Max / SubMax Testing Upper Body Ergometer 

 

Height Adjustable Stand Included

Does not run Wingate test

entry.title: Monark LC6 NOVO Electronically Controlled Testing Cycle Ergometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: HCI Fitness
Type: ergometer
Price: 17999.00

ACSM Member Discounts Available 

Call Now! 206-739-5400 


Perfect Fit Frame

Adjustable Seat Post

Fully adjustable setting of the seat position, within 20 cm horizontally. The seat post scale in centimeters on the side.

 

Adjustable Handlebar

Stem and handlebar fully adjustable for height and length. With an adjustable length of 20 cm.

Adjustable Q-Factor

Same bottom bracket shell as ordinary road bikes and both the bottom bracket and cranks are easy to change.


NOVO Technology

Novo Control Unit

With the new control unit we have secured future platform for Monark Ergometers. Connections that are compatible with the most common ECG, Spirometers and other external analysis equipment.

Novo Display

Monark Novo display unit can run the bike direct from the Resistive LCD touch screen. It is easy to set your training target with distance, time or calories with the user friendly interface.

Novo Motor

The new stronger, high quality, linear motor has superfast reactions, making the Monark novo motor unit 400% faster than previous models. This provides increased accuracy during testing, and a better ride feeling, with a more efficient workout

entry.title: Monark 894E Wingate Testing Bike - Anaerobic Testing Ergometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 8399.00

The Monark 894E is the world’s most widely used test bike for fitness tests and work tests. It is easy to calibrate and just as easy to check when in use. You know that all the values are always accurate.

entry.title: Monark 828E SubMax VO2 Cycle Ergometer - Bike for SubMaximal VO2 Testing
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 3899.00

ACSM Member Discounts Available 

Call Now! 206-739-5400 

The Monark 828E is the world’s most widely used test bike for fitness tests and work tests including SubMaximal (SubMax) VO2 and VO2 Max Testing.  The Monark 828E can be easy to calibrated using a hanging weight.  With over 100 years experience at Monark, you know that all the WATT and KP values are always accurate.
